name: Miles Adventure
description:
Hey! This was my final exam for the University course in the UTN here in Buenos Aires in 2021, the idea was to develop a concept game with lots of mechanics, assets, and to prove how good we are!

This is a concept game where I tested my knowledge, and where I tried to use most of the tools learned. I used lots of animations, music, VFX, particle systems, etc. I hope you enjoy it!

The game tells the story of Miles and his goal to reach the end. The only way he can achieve this is by completing each challenge that appears on his way, there are portals, puzzles and parkour!

CONTROLS
W, A, S, D for basic movement

SPACE to jump

Camera movement with mouse

SHIFT to run

E to interact
